page.title: 15CHILDRENS' GAMES 2
page.content: THIS GAME IS CALLED{"I SENT A LETTER {TO MY LOVE". EVERYBODY STANDS IN A RING AND ONE PERSON STANDS OUTSIDE THE RING HOLDING A PIECE OF PAPER(THE LETTER).THAT PERSON SKIPS AROUND THE RING SINGING {"I SENT A LETTER TO MY LOVE, {AND ON THE WAY I DROPPED IT. {ONE OF YOU HAS PICKED IT UP, {AND PUT IT IN YOUR POCKET. {WASN'T YOU,WASN'T YOU."}ETC. THEN THEY PUT THE LETTER IN SOMEONES HANDS AND SHOUT"WAS YOU".THE PERSON WHO HAS THE LETTER CHASES THE PERSON WHO GAVE HIM THE LETTER AROUND THE RING.THE PERSON WHO HAD THE LETTER HAS TO TRY TO GET IN TO THE PLACE OF THE PERSON WHO IS CHASEING HIM.IF THE PERSON WHO IS CHASEING CATCHES THE OTHER PERSON ,THE ONE WHO IS CAUGHT HAS TO GO IN THE MIDDLE OF THE CIRCLE FOR THREE GOES.
